meanings.definition: Cryobiologists: Scientists who study the effects of low temperatures on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The cryobiologists conducted experiments to understand how cold temperatures affect plants.
meanings.sent2: Many cryobiologists work tirelessly to research the impact of freezing temperatures on animals.
meanings.sent3: The cryobiologists were so fascinated by frozen frogs that they started calling them 'ice princes'.
meanings.sent4: In their research, cryobiologists delve into the icy mysteries of how living things survive extreme cold.
meanings.sent5: The cryobiologists' dedication to studying the chilling effects on organisms is truly admirable.
